This pattern references an inscribed surface.
This pattern references a specific artefact, usually a tablet.

..., gain, transshipped silver, and gain (lit. extra silver), Inanna, it is yours
Profit and benefit, loss and benefit, Inanna, it is yours
Making known(?) virility(?), pride, an alad and lamma protective spirit, and/at(?) the shrine, Inanna, it is yours
The exchange/change having been made(?), ..., Inanna, it is yours
..., slackening(?) ..., mercy and pity, Inanna, it is yours
Anger, fury, releasing(?) sin, ..., Inanna, it is yours
Shaking the heart(?) and the head, shivering, knowing no fear, ..., Inanna, it is yours
Marrying(?) spouses and herding them together(?), goodness, sweet love, Inanna, it is yours
Attaining/regulating(?) allure and arrogance(?), Inanna, it is yours
Poverty(?) and accumulation(?), raising (the neck) and making the raised neck bow down(?), Inanna, it is yours
... stupor/joy(?) ... Inanna, it is yours
..., Inanna, it is yours
